overview: Keeripulla is an tamil Action - romance movie direction by Firose Khan, who debuted as director with Paasakkara Nanbargal which also saw his son Yuvan debuting as a teenaged hero, is the director of Keeripulla. Saravanan plays villain role in thim movie and movie also has Thambi Ramaiya, Ponnambalam and others.
title: Keeripulla
